name: DF Pro Wireless Earbuds
description: High-quality wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and long battery life.
techSpecs: Bluetooth 5.2, 10mm dynamic drivers, active noise cancellation up to 35dB, 8h playback + 24h with case, IPX5 water resistance, USB-C fast charging, touch controls, and dual-microphone ENC for clear calls.

name: DF Studio Over-Ear Headphones
description: Over-ear headphones designed for studio-quality sound and all-day comfort.
techSpecs: 40mm neodymium drivers, frequency response 10Hz–40kHz, detachable 3.5mm cable, protein leather ear cushions, foldable design, impedance 32Ω, and passive noise isolation for precise studio monitoring.

name: DF Pulse Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, 12-hour battery, and water resistance.
techSpecs: Dual 20W drivers, Bluetooth 5.0, 12h battery life, IPX7 waterproof rating, TWS pairing, USB-C charging, built-in microphone for calls, and customizable EQ via mobile app.

name: DF Lite Wired Earphones
description: Affordable wired earphones with clear sound and built-in microphone.
techSpecs: 9mm drivers, in-line mic with single-button remote, 3.5mm jack, frequency response 20Hz–20kHz, flat anti-tangle cable, lightweight ABS housing, and ergonomic ear tips in 3 sizes.

name: DF Boom Max Party Speaker
description: Powerful party speaker with LED lights, dual subwoofers, and microphone input.
techSpecs: 100W RMS output, dual 6.5" subwoofers, RGB LED lighting modes, Bluetooth 5.0, AUX/USB/mic input, 10h battery, karaoke mode, built-in mixer, and reinforced handle for portability.

name: DF Air Pro Open-Ear Headphones
description: Open-ear headphones with ergonomic fit and ambient sound awareness.
techSpecs: Open-ear bone conduction tech, IP55 dust/sweat resistant, 8h battery life, multipoint Bluetooth 5.1, lightweight titanium frame, magnetic charging, and voice assistant integration.

name: DF Kids Volume-Limited Headphones
description: Colorful, safe headphones for kids with volume-limiting technology.
techSpecs: 85dB volume limiter, 30mm drivers, adjustable headband, soft foam cushions, detachable 3.5mm cable, tangle-free design, BPA-free plastic, and includes fun sticker pack for customization.

name: DF ANC Elite Wireless Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with advanced noise-canceling and touch controls.
techSpecs: Hybrid ANC up to 40dB, 40mm high-res drivers, Bluetooth 5.3, 30h battery life with ANC, touch gesture controls, USB-C fast charging, ambient mode, and foldable premium aluminum design.
